Energy-Efficient Door: Installing a door with an energy-efficient glass or insulation can help reduce energy consumption and improve the overall energy efficiency of the building.
Self-Cleaning Door: A door with a self-cleaning surface, such as a door coated with nanotechnology, can make cleaning easier and more effective.
Automatic Door: An automatic door that can open and close with the press of a button or by a sensor can improve accessibility and convenience.
Soundproofing Door: A door with soundproofing materials can help reduce noise from entering or leaving the room.
Aesthetic Door: A door with a unique and stylish design, such as a glass door or a door with artistic patterns, can enhance the aesthetic appeal of the space.
